chest1: May contain up to 2,000 battlepass experience
[Very Rare] May contain 1 bonus Rare item
chest2: May contain up to 5,000 battlepass experience
[Very Rare] May contain 1 bonus Mythical item
chest3: May contain up to 10,000 battlepass experience
[Very Rare] May contain 1 bonus Legendary item
chest4: May contain up to 25,000 battlepass experience
chest5: May contain up to 25,000 battlepass experience
[Ultra Rare] May contain 1 bonus Ultra Rare special companion
cosmetic_descriptions.announcer1: Congratulations! Whether you want it or not, you now own the greatest Announcer Pack ever created, voiced by the wise yet sometimes senile Old Man Gilly Winkle.
cosmetic_descriptions.announcer2: The voice of Mifune, a custom hero coming soon. Voiced by professional voice-actor Christopher Guerrero.
cosmetic_descriptions.picking1: Unlock a 4th hero slot in the pick screen
cosmetic_descriptions.picking2: Unlock a 4th hero slot in the pick screen
cosmetic_descriptions.reroll: Unlock an additional Re-roll in the pick screen (22 hour cooldown)
cosmetic_descriptions.reroll1: Unlock an additional Re-roll in the pick screen (22 hour cooldown)
cosmetic_descriptions.reroll2: Unlock an additional Re-roll in the pick screen (22 hour cooldown)
bpaccel1: 1 month of the following XP perks:
+50% experience on your first win of the day
bpaccel2: 1 month of the following XP perks:
+100% experience on your first win of the day
bpaccel3: Grants your Battlepass one month of Diamond tier
1 month of the following XP perks:
+100% experience on your first win of the day

quests.I like big items and I cannot lie: I like big items and I cannot lie
quests.Who wants to be a millionaire?: Who wants to be a millionaire?

home.row1: Path of Guardians (POG) is a custom game mode created by DotaCinema. It is currently in Beta. The goal of this custom game is to create a casual, stress-free environment for those that are looking for an alternative to the regular grind of ranked Dota 2. Whether you're a veteran player, or someone who stopped playing Dota a long time ago, or have never even played Dota before, we want this to be a welcome experience for all. This custom game is loosely inspired by ARAM, which in turn was also inspired by a Warcraft 3 mod.
home.row2-4: Tier 1, Tier 2 and two Tier 3 Towers protect the Ancient
home.row2-5: One Barracks - when destroyed, will deploy Mega Creeps
home.row2-7: This is a condensed version of Dota 2. We want it to be as accessible as possible. As a result, many Neutral items can be purchased, and will occupy a regular item slot. The end goal is the same, destroy the enemy Ancient to win!
home.row3-9: Fountain deals more damage, has multishot, and applies Break
home.row3-10: After 20 minutes, all buildings explode, exposing the Ancients and giving both teams Mega Creeps
home.row3-11: Fast paced but low-stress! You can finally stop worrying about last hits as gold is partially shared. Games will typically take between 10-15 minutes. They won't go much longer, trust us!
home.row4-2: No couriers in 3v3 Classic (enabled for 4v4 Chaos)
home.row4-3: Can't pick up & deliver other players' items
home.row4-4: Can't purchase consumable regen (tangos, healing salves, clarities, etc.)
home.row4-5: To prevent snowballing, we've kept to the spirit of ARAM by restricting certain aspects of the game. It's a give and take. Is it worth it to go back to base to pick up your items, or should you continue to fight?
home.row5-2: Two shrines provide 150% regeneration with a 2 minute cooldown
home.row5-3: Healing pods randomly appear after creeps die. Once activated, they provide hp/mana regeneration to units after 3 seconds
home.row5-5: Regeneration can be found aplenty in POG, just not in the usual places. Be sure to make use of the very low cooldown Shrines, and protect them at all cost!
home.row6-2: There are two Guardian pits on the map There are two (4 in 4v4 Chaos) Guardian pits on the map ({guardians}). Killing them provides a buff to your team for 5 minutes. They are reduced in effect for 4v4 POG Chaos.({guardians}). Killing them provides a buff to your team for 5 minutes.
home.row6-3: Both teams have vision of the North Guardian during the day, and the South Guardian at night. For 4v4 Chaos, Guardians are fully visible at all times.
home.row6-4: The Path of Guardians is protected by Ancient beings with very silly names. Defeat them to give your team an extra boost!
home.row7-2: Equip companions to be at your side
home.row7-3: Make them pretty with various effects
home.row7-4: Haven't you always wanted to be followed around by a cute little companion? Unless, of course, you get Parasight, the most hideous thing in existence.
home.row8-3: Level your {link} to upgrade item effects and much more!
home.row8-4: Complete daily quests to give XP and POGGERS
home.row8-5: Finish long term Achievements to further increase your XP and POGGERS
home.row8-6: Just in case you needed another reason to keep playing POG, we've implemented a progression system that will be ever-evolving. Also be sure to keep an eye on the {link} for weekly sales!
home.row9-2: Custom heroes are available to play in our 4v4 Chaos mode. Stay tuned for more heroes to be released in the future!
home.row9-3: Piggybacking off the work we did in our original CHIP mod, we plan to release custom heroes on a regular basis.

profile.bp_sellout: Purchase a {link} to increase your Daily XP

battle_pass.bonus_descr_1: A Legendary Chest on levels ending in 00
battle_pass.bonus_descr_2: A Mythical Chest on levels ending in 50
battle_pass.bonus_descr_3: A Rare Chest on all other levels ending in 0

armory.illegal_accelerator: You can't use an accelerator lower than your current level.

payment.added_to_account: has been added to your account.
payment.waiting_for_process: Waiting for payment to be processed...
payment.payment_issue: There may have been an issue processing your payment.
payment.success_1: It may take a very short period of time to add your items to your account.
payment.success_2: If you have an issue receiving your XP/POGGERS, please {contact_us}

faq.answer1: Yes! Dota 2 is completely free to play and this custom game within the client is also free.
faq.question2: I'm getting an error when loading a game "Custom game archive does not match the lobby leader"
faq.answer2: This is a very common issue with custom games. The error message essentially means that you or the host's custom game are not fully updated. There are a few ways to ensure you have the latest update.
faq.answer2-5: Install the Custom game mode (You should see a download progress bar. If it is instant, then it did not work)
faq.answer2-9: If you see a download progress bar, then it should work. If you do NOT see it, it definitely did NOT work.
faq.answer2-12: Go into Steam/Library and then click on the Downloads button at the bottom
faq.answer2-13: There should be a download button for Dota 2 Workshop
faq.answer3: Guardians are Mini-bosses that can be found on opposite sides of the map. Whichever team slays the beast will be provided with a buff for 5 minutes. You can learn more about their skills and buffs {here}. There are currently 3 Guardians in the game (only 2 can be spawned at one time).
faq.answer4: POGGERS stands for Path of Guardians Growth Experience Reward System. Yes, we forced that one pretty hard. POGGERS are the in-game currency for this custom game. You get this currency simply by playing the game. You can also purchase them with real money. {link}  to see a full list of cosmetics that can be purchased with POGGERS.
faq.answer5: Yes! You will receive XP for simply playing games, which will level your Battle Pass. You can also receive XP by completing achievements and daily quests. In addition, you can purchase an XP booster which will help you level your Battle Pass even faster.
faq.question6: How do I unlock the 4th picking slot?
faq.answer6: The 4th slot can be unlocked by gaining level 40 in your Battle Pass.
faq.question7: How do re-rolls work and how can I get more?
faq.answer7: Every game you will receive 1 free re-roll. The Battle Pass has several unlocks that will give you additional re-rolls per day.
faq.question8: Where can I hang out with other POG players?
faq.answer9: Yes! We have many custom heroes in the works that we plan to announce more on in the near future.
faq.question11: How do the Healing Pods work?
faq.answer11: A healing pod will drop randomly upon the death of creeps. They will stay indefinitely on the ground until a hero walks over to activate them. Once activated, pods will provide healing and mana regeneration to ANY heroes that are within the given area after a 3 second period. This 3 second period should be obvious via both visually and audio cues. The regeneration will not be canceled from taking damage, but the pods themselves to not stack. If you activate multiple pods on top of each other, they will instead refresh the duration of the regeneration buff.
faq.question12: Will you be balancing heroes specifically for this mode?
faq.answer12: We will be gathering data during the open beta period to see if this is necessary. There are certainly some heroes that are very good in this mode specifically, but we also want to make sure we don't overwhelm newer players to a bunch of changes to the heroes themselves (at least not right away). Based on both data and feedback we will consider tweaking certain heroes.
faq.question14: When there is a gameplay patch for Dota, does it automatically apply to POG?
faq.answer14: This is a tricky question to answer. For number changes, it almost always updates automatically. There are some exceptions for certain items that we've had to re-create with special effects (Pipe, Shivas, etc). When things like hero stats/talents/aghs are changed, they should work right away in our mod. However, there are times when an update could break custom games in general. In these rare cases, you can expect a speedy update from us to remedy the situation.
faq.answer13: Open your Dota 2, navigate to the Arcade tab, and search for Path of Guardians. Install the game and you're good to go!

guardians.monkey_business_description: Monkeys occasionally attack by throwing poop. Affected enemies are disgusted for the duration, attacking and moving slower and taking damage over time.
guardians.gang_up_description: If two or more heroes attack Monkey, she summons three mini-monkeys to help her cause. Mini-monkeys also have Monkey Business.
guardians.spell_block_description: Blocks one targeted spell every 15 seconds. Also adds 25% status reistance.
guardians.shattered_helm_description: Upon death, the team that slays Monkey receives an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of War for 5 minutes. Effects: +50% damage, health, and attack speed to allied creeps.
guardians.obese_reality_description: Pooky channels her inner lard resulting in a frenzy of attacks. Her attack speed is increased by 200 for 8 seconds.
guardians.cleavage_description: Pooky uses extra blubber in her attacks to make sure all her enemies feel her fatness, thus dealing 175% cleave damage to enemies.
guardians.sacred_flame_description: Upon death, the team that slays Pooky will receive an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of Power for 5 minutes. Effects: +25% damage amplification to allied heroes
guardians.tea_time_description: When more than one enemy is within reach of Bucket, he will spill his tea in an area around him. The tea deals damage over time and slows enemy movement speed. Each time this is cast, the cooldown will be reduced. Cooldown will be reset to default after 30 seconds of inactivity.
guardians.ashes_of_codex_description: Upon death, the team that slays Bucket will receive an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of Time for 5 minutes. Effects: 25% cooldown reduction for all allied heroes.
guardians.weave_description: Lulu hides deep inside her web. Enemies inside it have their vision range reduced to 500.
guardians.insatiable_thirst_description: If 2 or more heroes attack Lulu, her thirst manifests, granting her 90 bonus damage and 175% lifesteal for 30 seconds.
guardians.cursed_chalice_description: Upon death, the team that slays Lulu will receive an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of Time for 5 minutes. +25% lifesteal and spell lifesteal against enemy heroes. 10% to other sources.
guardians.bad_touch_description: Fig passively reduces all enemy attack speed in the area by 50
guardians.taking_you_with_me_description: Upon death, Fig will explode, dealing 500 pure damage for each hero in the explosion. Each hero increases damage by 500.
guardians.fig_buff_description: Upon death, the team that slays Fig will receive an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of Death for 5 minutes. Effects: Upon death, a wraith of yourself will spawn, delaying death for 5 seconds.
guardians.lard_incarnate_description: Roo passively reduces all damage he receives by 30%.
guardians.bugle_mode_description: If two or more enemies attack Roo, he will reflect 100% of damage for 10 seconds.
guardians.bugles_blessing_description: Upon death, the team that slays Roo will receive an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of Defense for 5 minutes.  Effects: Provides 25% (10% in 4v4) Damage Reduction
guardians.alot_of_armor_description: Løg passively provides himself +100 armor. This, however, comes at a cost for him, as he only has half a normal Guardian's HP.
guardians.chain_sheep_description: Only castable if Løg is attacked by 2 or more heroes. Upon cast will sheep a random enemy for 1 second, dealing 200 magical damage. This effect continues to bounce to random units in range.
guardians.wizard_hat_description: Upon death, the team that slays Løg will receive an Artifact belonging to the Guardian of Sorcery for 5 minutes. Effects: +250 (+100 in 4v4) Cast Range

pc.name: Penguin Commandos
talents: Happy Feet provides haste to allies for 5 seconds
Add 4 Penguins to March of the Penguins

abilities.name: Penguin Launcher
abilities.description: Sends a penguin in a specified direction, exploding on the first enemy target it reaches, dealing damage and mini-stunning. Additional penguins from this ability that hit an enemy within 3 seconds will deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Happy Feet
abilities.description: Penguin Commandos create an icy surface on the ground, causing unstable footing and lowering magic resistance. Enemy heroes will uncontrollably skate within the patch of ice for its full duration, Although they are confined within this area, they can still attack and cast spells.

abilities.name: Snowball Effect
abilities.description: Penguin Commando's regular attack will occasionally send out a snowball instead, which will explode on contact. Each attack will lower the cooldown by 1.

abilities.name: March of the Penguins
abilities.description: After a short delay, drop 6 King Penguins from the sky in a line.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Adds a 30% slow and 100 magical damage per second over 5 seconds to March of the Penguins.

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Penguin Launcher deals damage in a 200 AoE

abilities.name: Ephemeral Slash
abilities.description: Mifune moves to a specific location, dealing damage along the way. At the end of the trajectory, he will appear via an explosion that will deal bonus damage and blind enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Echo Strike
abilities.description: Passively counter-attacks when enemies miss their attacks on Mifune. Upon activation, grants bonus evasion.

abilities.name: Zanmato
abilities.description: Mifune's next attack deals bonus magical damage, and slows its target by 100% for 0.6s.

abilities.name: Shattered Souls
abilities.description: Spawns 4 shattered souls at the target location, each of which can be destroyed in 2 hits. Each soul afflicts enemies in the area with a different curse. The area affected will will grow every second until it reaches maximum radius. Whenever one of the souls is destroyed, the remaining souls progress to their next level.

stats.values: Mini Stuns a random enemy hero (0.25 seconds)
Deals physical damage per second to nearby enemies
Slows enemies in the affected area

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Provides a new sub ability for the Ultimate. Destroy a sword of choice, and then distribute 3 HP evenly to the remaining swords

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Zanmato dispels enemies of positive buffs

thunderboar.name: Thunder Boar
talents: Thunder Stomp deals pure damage and pierces spell immunity

abilities.name: Thunder Stomp
abilities.description: Thunderboar releases pure energy upon the ground, starting at Thunderboar's location and extending outward in 3 rings over a 1 second period. Units are able to be hit multiple times. Each wave deals damage and slows.

abilities.name: Thunder Rush
abilities.description: Thunderboar dashes in the given direction, forcing units ahead of that point to be relocated towards him. Enemy units will be mini-stunned and take damage.

abilities.name: Thunder Pups
abilities.description: Every creep killed by Thunderboar will create a thunderpup, which deal damage over time in an area around him. When activated, Thunderboar will consume his oldest pup in order to gain a burst of health. Can be used repeatedly.

abilities.name: Thunder Dome
abilities.description: Creates a large circular storm on the targeted location, which instantly provides Thunderboar with max Thunderpups. Enemies are slowed within the storm, with the slow itself increasing the closer they are to the center. If Thunderboar leaves the area of the storm, it will end prematurely.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Thunderous Rush's effects upgrade from a cone area to a 360 degree AoE

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Thunder Dome heals teammates for 100hp per second

abilities.name: Mind Flow
abilities.description: Alexandria throws puddles of energy on the ground. These puddles deal an immediate 25/50/75/100 damage and then 50 damage per second. They will also slow movement speed by 20%. Any damage done by these puddles will heal Alexandria. These puddles do not stack damage or slow. This ability comes with 1/1/2/2 charges.

abilities.name: Forbidden Veil
abilities.description: Summons a transparent wall after a 1 second delay. When an enemy hero passes through for the first time, they will be stunned for 1.0/1.5/2.0/2.5 seconds. Any additional heroes that pass through will not be stunned, but will instead take bonus damage, increasing with each subsequent hero.  Heroes cannot be affected by this ability more than once.

abilities.name: Blind Faith
abilities.description: Upon activation, applies a debuff to enemies in a coned shape area. This debuff will cause enemies to take amplified damage as well as increase their cast time. Casting a spell will remove this debuff. When the spell is removed, the enemy takes magical damage.

abilities.name: Soul Splice
abilities.description: Jump inside an Ally, thereby making Alexandria invulnerable. You are able to cast your abilities and items as normal, but you are still affected by any stuns and silences targeted towards the host. Mind Flow will heal both you and your host. While Alexandria remains inside, the following will be increased for the host: Damage Reduction: 20% Movement speed: +20 movement speed Turn rate becomes: 1.0

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Forbidden Veil will last for 4 additional seconds. Allies passing through Forbidden Veil will be granted +300 phased movement speed for 2 seconds. In addition, they will be healed for 300 and have 200 mana refreshed. Every additional allied hero that passes through will get bonus HP and mana in addition to the base amount. Allied heroes can only be affected by this ability once.

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Adds an additional skill for Alexandria: No Accident. Effect: Make you and your host invulnerable to all damage for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Temporal Jump
abilities.description: Warp Beast jumps to the targeted location over 0.6 seconds, creating an expanding wave upon landing which spreads over a radius and hits affected enemies with an attack. Has 3 charges and deals bonus damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Latch
abilities.description: Warp Beast latches onto the back of an enemy unit or tower, granting increased attackspeed and causing him to continually attack his target while latched.

abilities.name: Mana Eater
abilities.description: Warp Beast drains mana on attacks, restoring mana equal to the amount drained. If Warp Beast kills a unit, he will also drain mana equal to 25%  of the unit's max mana. Any excess mana drained will be stored as bonus mana which lasts until spent, up to a limit.

abilities.name: Warp
abilities.description: While toggled, whenever Warp Beast attempts to cast a spell or use an item on a target or location beyond its cast range, he will warp to a random position within range of the ability, spending mana based on how much further the target or location is from its range.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Every time Warp Beast casts a spell, he gains a shield for 1.5 seconds that reduces incoming damage by 30%. Each subsequent cast does not stack, but refreshes the buff instead.

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Attacking while latched applies a stackable -2 armor, lasting 3 seconds.

troy.name: Jeremy Khan
talents: Greater Fortitude cap increased to 20% & 200 dps

abilities.name: Battle Thrust
abilities.description: Jumps on top of an area, dealing damage & slowing. For every hero/creep you hit you gain status resistance. Will also heal Jeremy based on how many heroes are hit.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: After a 2 second delay, units around Jeremy will take damage based off of Jeremy's Max HP and be vacuumed towards him.  Creeps are only damaged by the base amount.

abilities.name: Greater Fortitude
abilities.description: Passively provides HP regen and deals damage over time in an area around Jeremy based on how much damage he's taken. Damage is calculated before armor reductions. (Note: self-damage counts). Buff lasts 5 seconds and can be refreshed upon taking more damage.

abilities.name: Red Mist Rage
abilities.description: Instantly enter into a raged-frenzy where Jeremy gains a burst of Max HP and bonus damage while taking damage over time.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Provides Jeremy with a new passive ability: I'll Be Back. When slain, and after a 3 second delay, Jeremy will rise again with 25% HP. Upon revival, his current level of Fury is cast for free.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Red Mist Rage hard dispels upon activation and can be used while disabled.

abilities.name: Divine Intervention
abilities.description: Ministuns the target, dealing Max HP percentage-based magical damage and reducing their movement speed while channeling, increasing the effectiveness each second.

abilities.name: Mystic Twister
abilities.description: While channeling, deals magical damage per second in a radius at target location and grants True Sight on enemies inside the area.

abilities.name: Conviction
abilities.description: Passive. Upon channeling an item or spell, La'thaal will gain temporary magic immunity. The buff will continue to work on illusions.

abilities.name: Superposition
abilities.description: Teleport to a target location up to 650 units away, leaving behind an illusion of yourself. If a channeled ability was interrupted, the illusion will continue to channel that ability for you.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Adds +1 Superposition Max Charges

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Superposition grants invisibility (1.5s)

abilities.name: Antipode
abilities.description: Innate passive ability. Scaldris' spells have a dual nature; he picks one of two elemental aspects when casting them. Casting the fire version of a spell switches its aspect to cold, and vice-versa.

abilities.name: Heatwave
abilities.description: Launches a wave of smoldering hot air in a straight line. Deals fire damage to any enemies hit. When used, will be replaced by Cold Front.

abilities.name: Cold Front
abilities.description: Causes cold energy to explode in a target, slowing it for a duration. When used, will be replaced by Heatwave.

abilities.name: Scorch
abilities.description: Summons blazing flames that scorch all nearby enemies, dealing fire damage and blinding them. When used, will be replaced by Freeze.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: Launches a slow-moving wave of chilling wind in a straight line. Enemies hit are slowed. When used, will be replaced by Scorch.

abilities.name: Jet Blaze
abilities.description: Propels yourself ahead by spewing a massive cone of fire backwards. Enemies in the cone or in your path take fire damage. When used, will be replaced by Ice Floes.

abilities.name: Ice Floes
abilities.description: Launches an ice tracer to a target location. Upon reaching it or its maximum range, the tracer teleports you to its location. Enemies in the line between your initial and final position during the teleport are slowed. When used, will be replaced by Jet Blaze.

abilities.name: Living Flame
abilities.description: Summons a living, hungry flame that deals fire damage to its host. If Living Flame's debuff is ended prematurely by an Antipode proc or the death of its host, it jumps to a random enemy in range, refreshing its duration in the process. If Living Flame's duration expires naturally, its effects end without spreading. When used, will be replaced by Absolute Zero.

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.description: Targets an enemy with an unerring sphere utterly devoid of any heat. Upon reaching its mark, the sphere explodes, freezing it. The cold is so intense that, even after being unfrozen, the unit's movement is still slowed by 60%. The slow then decays gradually, as the unit thaws and recovers its movements. When used, will be replaced by Living Flame.

abilities.name: Scepter
abilities.description: Causes casting fire spells to grant +10% spell amplification, and casting ice spells to grant +10% cooldown reduction. Both effects last for 10 seconds, can stack up to 4 times, and refresh themselves.

abilities.name: Shard
abilities.description: Ice spells recover 2.5% of your maximum mana for each target they hit.
